meta.description: Image-to-Prompt JSON Schema - Hybrid of GPT structure + Gemini natural descriptions
meta.note: Entire JSON is the prompt - no full_prompt_text needed

image_style.description: One-line description of image type and style

subject.type: string | human, product, object, food, abstract, scene, graphic
subject.description: string | Natural language description of main subject

details._note: Dynamic fields based on subject type

if_human.anatomy: string | Detailed description of visible body parts and cropping
if_human.body_visible: array | face, neck, collarbone, hands, full_body...
if_human.cropping: string | What's cropped out (e.g., 'face cropped above chin', 'waist down not visible')
if_human.pose: string | Natural description of body position and gesture
if_human.expression: string | Facial expression and emotional state if visible

skin.texture: string | Natural with visible pores, smooth retouched, matte, dewy...
skin.tone: string | Warm beige, cool ivory, deep brown, sun-kissed...
skin.quality: string | Natural with retained pore detail (not over-smoothed), studio-perfect, raw...

if_human.hair: string | Style, color, texture (e.g., 'messy low ponytail with loose strands, light blonde')
if_human.clothing: object | { top, bottom, accessories with natural descriptions }
if_human.accessories: array | Jewelry, bags, hats with specific details

if_product.material: string | matte cardboard, glossy glass, leather...

if_food.dish_type: string | salad bowl, plated dish, ingredients...

environment.setting: string | studio, cafe, bedroom, outdoor, abstract...
environment.props: array | Small details like bottle, napkin, flowers...

lighting.type: string | soft diffused, hard shadow, natural daylight, studio directional...
lighting.direction: string | from upper left, side, overhead, backlit...
lighting.quality: string | warm, cool, dramatic, golden hour...
lighting.shadow: string | soft gradient, hard cast shadow to right, minimal...

fields.framing: string | extreme close-up, medium shot, wide, full-body...
fields.camera_angle: string | eye level, overhead 45-degree, low angle, isometric...
fields.focus: string | sharp on subject, shallow depth of field, background blurred...
fields.subject_position: string | centered, rule of thirds, left side...
fields.negative_space: string | generous on upper right, minimal, balanced...

color_palette.description: Colors in natural language (NO HEX codes)

fields.mood: string | muted, vibrant, pastel, earthy, monochrome...

fields.font_style: string | thin serif, bold sans-serif, brush calligraphy...
fields.placement: string | centered, top-left, overlaid on subject...

intended_use.description: What this image is best suited for
